title: Bloomberg Markets: Price on Detroit Recovery
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Price on Detroit Recovery
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Russell Price Senior Economist Ameriprise Financial Discussing the city of Detroit which he says is a good story but has a long way to go.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
